snippet.title: Broken Edge | Launch Trailer (Meta Quest 2 & SteamVR)
snippet.description:
Time to unsheath your blade and become the world's greatest swordfighter...

Broken Edge is OUT NOW on Quest 2 & SteamVR for only $9.99!

⚔️ Quest 2: https://ocul.us/3SyEH6S
⚔️ SteamVR: https://bit.ly/3gyFAiA

Broken Edge is a VR dueling game where you embody historical swordfighters. Use their unique techniques and powers combined with cutting-edge fencing mechanics to claim victory against online components and climb the ranks!

Join the blade-cutting community on Discord at https://discord.gg/MRYzBvFWzU

Stay tuned on the following social channels:

• Twitter - https://twitter.com/BrokenEdgeVR
• Facebook - https://facebook.com/BrokenEdgeVR
• Instagram - https://instagram.com/BrokenEdgeVR

Broken Edge is developed by TREBUCHET and published by Fast Travel Games.

Read more on www.fasttravelgames.com/games/brokenedge

#VirtualReality #BrokenEdgeVR #VR
